meanings.definition: A plan for carrying out a process or procedure.
meanings.sent1: My teacher gave me a schedule for completing my homework assignments.
meanings.sent2: The schedule for the school day is posted on the bulletin board.
meanings.sent3: I forgot my schedule at home, so I didn't know which class to go to next!
meanings.sent4: Her daily schedule is like a well-organized puzzle, fitting all the pieces perfectly.
meanings.sent5: Following a schedule helps me stay on track and get things done efficiently.

meanings.definition: A list of planned events or activities showing the times or dates when they are intended to happen.
meanings.sent1: The concert schedule listed all the upcoming performances.
meanings.sent2: I checked the schedule to see when the movie was playing.
meanings.sent3: The schedule for the party had to be changed due to bad weather.
meanings.sent4: The schedule of events for the festival was packed with exciting activities.
meanings.sent5: Having a clear schedule helps avoid conflicts and confusion about plans.

meanings.definition: To arrange or plan events or activities to take place at a particular time.
meanings.sent1: I need to schedule a meeting with my boss to discuss my project.
meanings.sent2: She schedules her workouts in the morning to start the day off right.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally scheduled two appointments at the same time!
meanings.sent4: The team captain schedules regular practice sessions to improve performance.
meanings.sent5: Remember to schedule some time for relaxation and self-care in your busy day.
